Package it.polimi.se2018.model

Class Model

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.utils.Observable<Message>
      • it.polimi.se2018.model.Model
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Model
extends Observable<Message>
implements java.io.Serializable
    This is the Model of the Game. It contains the state of the game. It's observable by the View, and it can be modified by the Controller.
    Author:
    Matteo Gagliano, Carmelo Fascella, Generoso Imparato
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • Model

        public Model​()
        Constructor that instantiates the game field. It creates the ArrayList of the players initially empty, the Dicebag, the Draftpool, the Roundtrack, and three random PublicObjectiveCard

      • Model

        public Model​(Model model)
        It's the copy constructor
        Parameters:
        model - that will be copied

    • Method Detail

      • addDraftedDieToBoard

        public void addDraftedDieToBoard​(int row,
                                 int column,
                                 boolean ignoreValueRestriction,
                                 boolean ignoreColorRestriction,
                                 boolean ignoreAdjacentRestriction)
                          throws ChangeModelStateException,
                                 ActionNotPossibleException
        Method that adds the drafted Die in the chosen coordinates. Then it notifies the view with the AddedDieMessage.
        Parameters:
        row - first coordinate
        column - second coordinante
        ignoreValueRestriction - if true ignore the value restriction of the placing of the Die
        ignoreColorRestriction - if true, ignore the color restriction of the placing of the Die
        ignoreAdjacentRestriction - if true, ignore the adjacent restriction of the placing of the Die
        Throws:
        ChangeModelStateException - if there isn't any drafted Die to add on the board
        ActionNotPossibleException

      • addLastDiceToRoundTrack

        public void addLastDiceToRoundTrack​()
        Method that add the last die or dice remaining on the DraftPool at the end of the turn, on the position of the current round of the RoundTrack

      • addNewPlayer

        public void addNewPlayer​(java.lang.String nickname)
                  throws ChangeModelStateException
        Method that add a new Player with the name passed by parameter. If the player is added, it notifies the view with the AddedPlayerMessage
        Parameters:
        nickname - is the name of the player to add
        Throws:
        ChangeModelStateException - if the nickname is empty or if there is a player with the same nickname

      • chooseDieFromRoundTrack

        public void chooseDieFromRoundTrack​(int round)
                             throws ChangeModelStateException
        Throws:
        ChangeModelStateException

      • decrementDraftedDie

        public void decrementDraftedDie​()
                         throws ChangeModelStateException
        Method that decrements the Drafted Die. Then it notifies the View with the ChangedDraftedDie
        Throws:
        ChangeModelStateException - if there isn't a drafted Die

      • draftDie

        public void draftDie​(int dieNum)
              throws ChangeModelStateException
        Method that drafts a die from the DraftPool. Then it notifies the View with the DraftedDieMessage.
        Parameters:
        dieNum - is the number of the drafted Die
        Throws:
        ChangeModelStateException - if there isn't the selected Die

      • drawFromDiceBag

        public void drawFromDiceBag​()
        Method that draws the right number of dice from the Dicebag to the Draftpool at the beginning of each round.

      • endGame

        public void endGame​()
        Getter of the 4 schemeCard that a player can choose

      • findPlayer

        public Player findPlayer​(Color color)
                  throws NoElementException
        Method that find the Player with the color passed by parameter
        Parameters:
        color - the color of the player that we are searching
        Returns:
        the player searched
        Throws:
        NoElementException - if there isn't the player searched

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the player searched
        Throws:
        NoElementException - if there isn't the player searched

      • getCurrentToolCardNumber

        public int getCurrentToolCardNumber​()
        Getter of the current ToolCard number
        Returns:
        the current ToolCard number or -1 in case of tool card not being used

      • getDiceBag

        Getter of the DiceBag
        Returns:
        the DiceBag of the Game

      • getDie

        public Die getDie​(int dieType)
        Getter of the Die, that could be a selected, a drafted or a chosen Die
        Parameters:
        dieType - it's the type of the Die that you want to get. 0 = Drafted, 1 = Selected, 2 = Chosen
        Returns:
        the chosen Die

      • getDraftedDie

        public Die getDraftedDie​()
        Getter of the last drafted Die
        Returns:
        the last drafted Die or null if there is not a drafted Die

      • getDraftPool

        public DraftPool getDraftPool​()
        Getter of the DraftPool
        Returns:
        the DraftPool of the Game

        Getter of the number of the players
        Returns:
        the numbers of the players in the model

      • getPlayers

        Getter of the List of the Player
        Returns:
        all the players

        public java.util.List<Card> getPublicObjectiveCards​()
        Getter of the PublicObjectiveCard
        Returns:
        the list of the three PublicObjectiveCards of the Game

        public RoundTrack getRoundTrack​()
        Getter of the RoundTrack
        Returns:
        the RoundTrack of the Game

      • getSelectedDie

        public Die getSelectedDie​()

        Returns:

      • hasEveryPlayerChosenSchemeCard

        public boolean hasEveryPlayerChosenSchemeCard​()
        Method that says if every player have chosen the scheme card
        Returns:
        true if every player have chosen the scheme card, false if not

      • incrementDraftedDie

        public void incrementDraftedDie​()
                         throws ChangeModelStateException
        Method that increments the value of the Drafted Die. Then it notifies the View with the ChangedDraftedDieMessage
        Throws:
        ChangeModelStateException - if there isn't a drafted Die

      • invertDie

        public void invertDie​(int dieType)
               throws ChangeModelStateException
        Throws:
        ChangeModelStateException

      • isEveryPlayerReady

        public boolean isEveryPlayerReady​()
        Method that says if all the players are ready
        Returns:
        true if every player is ready, false if not

      • isGameStarded

        public boolean isGameStarded​()
        Method that says if the game is started or not
        Returns:
        a boolean that is true if the game is started, false if not.

      • moveSelectedDie

        public void moveSelectedDie​(int row,
                            int column,
                            boolean ignoreValueRestriction,
                            boolean ignoreColorRestriction,
                            boolean ignoreAdjacentRestriction)
                     throws ChangeModelStateException
        Method that moves the selected Die at the given position. Then it notifies the View with the MovedDieMessage
        Parameters:
        row - first coordinate
        column - second coordinate
        ignoreValueRestriction - if true, ignore the value restriction of the chosen position
        ignoreColorRestriction - if true, ignore the color restriction of the chosen position
        ignoreAdjacentRestriction - if true, ignore the adjacent restriction of the chosen position
        Throws:
        ChangeModelStateException - if there isn't a selected Die

      • reDrawDraftedDie

        public void reDrawDraftedDie​()

      • removePlayer

        public void removePlayer​(java.lang.String nickname)
                  throws ChangeModelStateException
        Method that removes the Player with the string passed by parameter
        Parameters:
        nickname - of the player to remove
        Throws:
        ChangeModelStateException - if there is not player with the name passed by parameter

      • returnDraftedDie

        public void returnDraftedDie​()
                      throws ChangeModelStateException
        Method that returns the Die just drafted . If there is a drafted Die, it notifies the view with a ReturnedDieMessage
        Throws:
        ChangeModelStateException - if there isn't a drafted Die

      • rollDie

        public void rollDie​(int dieType)
             throws ChangeModelStateException
        Method that rolls a Die chosen by his type, passed by parameter
        Parameters:
        dieType - type of the Die to roll. 0 = drafted, 1 = selected, 2 = chosen
        Throws:
        ChangeModelStateException - if there isn't a Die to Roll

      • rollDraftPool

        public void rollDraftPool​()

      • selectDieFromBoard

        public void selectDieFromBoard​(Player player,
                               int row,
                               int column)
                        throws ChangeModelStateException
        Method that select a Die at the given coordinates from the Board of a Player
        Parameters:
        player - who wants to select the Die
        row - first coordinate
        column - second coordinate
        Throws:
        ChangeModelStateException - if the selected cell doesn't contain any Die

      • selectRandomSchemeCardsForPlayers

        public void selectRandomSchemeCardsForPlayers​()
                                       throws ChangeModelStateException
        Method that generates four random scheme cards for each player. Then it notifies the view with the SelectedPlayerSchemeCardsMessage
        Throws:
        ChangeModelStateException - if there aren't too many cards to load for each player

      • selectSameColorDieFromBoard

        public void selectSameColorDieFromBoard​(Player player,
                                        int row,
                                        int column,
                                        int dieType)
                                 throws ChangeModelStateException
        Throws:
        ChangeModelStateException

      • setCurrentPlayer

        public void setCurrentPlayer​(Player player)
        Setter of the current Player
        Parameters:
        player - that will be set as current one

      • setCurrentPlayerActive

        public void setCurrentPlayerActive​(boolean active)

      • setCurrentRound

        public void setCurrentRound​(int currentRound)
                     throws ChangeModelStateException
        Method that saves the reference to the current round
        Parameters:
        currentRound - is the number that indicates the current round. It can be >0 && <9
        Throws:
        ChangeModelStateException - if the value of the parameter is invalid

      • setCurrentToolCard

        public void setCurrentToolCard​(int cardNum)
                        throws ChangeModelStateException
        Setter of the current ToolCard
        Parameters:
        cardNum - it's the number of the chosen ToolCard. Each player can choose between three cards, from cardNum = 0 to cardNum = 3
        Throws:
        ChangeModelStateException - if the index of the card is not valid

      • setNoCurrentToolCard

        public void setNoCurrentToolCard​()

      • setPlayerActive

        public void setPlayerActive​(Player player,
                            boolean active)

      • setPlayerReady

        public void setPlayerReady​(Player player,
                           boolean ready)
        Setter of the player who is ready to play. It notifies the View with the PlayerReadyMessage
        Parameters:
        player - is the player we want to set ready
        ready - is a boolean that if it's true, it sets the player in a ready state

      • setPlayerSchemeCard

        public void setPlayerSchemeCard​(Player player,
                                int choice)
                         throws ChangeModelStateException
        Setter of the Board selected by each player
        Parameters:
        player - who is setting the board
        choice - number of the board chosen. Each player can choose between four boards, from choice = 0 to choice = 4
        Throws:
        ChangeModelStateException - this exception is thrown if the choice of the board is not valid

      • setPublicCards

        public void setPublicCards​(java.util.List<Card> publicCards)

      • setSchemeCards

        public void setSchemeCards​(java.util.List<Board> schemeCards)
        Setter of all the Boards selected by the Players
        Parameters:
        schemeCards - is a list of boards of the Players who join the game

      • setStartTimer

        public void setStartTimer​(int timer)

      • setToolCards

        public void setToolCards​(java.util.List<Card> toolCards)
        Setter of the list of ToolCards to use in the game
        Parameters:
        toolCards - is the list of the cards to save as reference

      • setTurnTimer

        public void setTurnTimer​(int timer)

      • startGame

        public void startGame​()
               throws ChangeModelStateException
        Method that starts the game and then it notifies the view with the StartedGameMessage
        Throws:
        ChangeModelStateException - if there aren't enough players to start the game, or not every player has chosen a scheme card

        public void swapDraftedChosenDie​()
